original: CECILY PARSLEY lived in a pen,

jan Ke Tami: soweli Wekasi li lon tomo soweli,

original: And brewed good ale for gentlemen;

jan Ke Tami: jan suli li kama lon tenpo suno ale,

jan Ke Tami: taso soweli Wekasi li tawa weka.

jan Ke Tami: waso, waso, waso o,

jan Ke Tami: tawa ma sewi. tawa ma anpa.

jan Ke Tami: tawa tomo mi kin.

jan Pulepo: soweli ni li awen lon tomo ona;

jan Ke Tami: soweli ni li toki e ike ni:

jan Ke Tami: "mu! mu! mu!

original: I can't find my way home.

jan Ke Tami: mi sona ala e nasin tawa tomo mi!"

jan Ke Tami: "soweli o, sina lon ala lon?

original: I thank you kindly, little dog, ⁠I fare as well as you!
